00036 #ifndef __btkUserMacro_h
00037 #define __btkUserMacro_h
00038 
00039 #include "itkWin32Header.h"
00040 #include "itkConfigure.h"
00041 
00042 #include <string>
00043 
00045 #define itkSetMacroNoDeb(name,type) \
00046   virtual void Set##name (const type _arg) \
00047   { \
00048     if (this->m_##name != _arg) \
00049       { \
00050       this->m_##name = _arg; \
00051       this->Modified(); \
00052       } \
00053   }
00054 
00056 #define itkGetMacroNoDeb(name,type) \
00057   virtual type Get##name () \
00058   { \
00059     return this->m_##name; \
00060   }
00061 
00063 #define UserSetMacro(name,type) \
00064   virtual void Set##name (int i, const type _arg) \
00065   { \
00066     itkDebugMacro("setting " #name " to " << _arg); \
00067     if (this->m_##name[i] != _arg) \
00068       { \
00069       this->m_##name[i] = _arg; \
00070       this->Modified(); \
00071       } \
00072   }
00073 
00078 #define UserSetObjectMacro(name,type) \
00079   virtual void Set##name (int i, type* _arg ) \
00080   { \
00081     if (this->m_##name[i] != _arg) \
00082       { \
00083       this->m_##name[i] = _arg; \
00084       this->Modified(); \
00085       } \
00086   }
00087 
00090 #define UserGetObjectMacro(name,type) \
00091   virtual type * Get##name (int i) \
00092   { \
00093     itkDebugMacro("returning " #name " address " << this->m_##name[i] ); \
00094     return this->m_##name[i].GetPointer(); \
00095   }
00096 
00101 #define UserSetConstObjectMacro(name,type) \
00102   virtual void Set##name (int i, const type* _arg) \
00103   { \
00104     itkDebugMacro("setting " << #name " to " << _arg ); \
00105     if (this->m_##name[i] != _arg) \
00106       { \
00107       this->m_##name[i] = _arg; \
00108       this->Modified(); \
00109       } \
00110   }
00111 
00112 
00115 #define UserGetConstObjectMacro(name,type) \
00116   virtual const type * Get##name (int i) const \
00117   { \
00118     itkDebugMacro("returning " #name " address " << this->m_##name[i] ); \
00119     return this->m_##name[i].GetPointer(); \
00120   }
00121 
00124 #define UserGetConstReferenceObjectMacro(name,type) \
00125   virtual const typename type::Pointer & Get##name (int i) const \
00126   { \
00127     itkDebugMacro("returning " #name " address " << this->m_##name[i] ); \
00128     return this->m_##name[i]; \
00129   }
00130 
00131 #endif
